titles.title: Safeguarding Assets For Employees in Bankruptcy Act of 2004
To amend title 11 of the United States Code to provide priority for the payment of employee claims arising under the Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification Act.
Safeguarding Assets For Employees in Bankruptcy Act of 2004

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: Safeguarding Assets For Employees in Bankruptcy Act of 2004 - Amends Federal bankruptcy law to: (1) increase from $4,000 to $20,000 the dollar amount of specified unsecured claims related to employment benefits in the third and fourth priority tier; and (2) place in fifth order of priority the allowed unsecured claims of employees arising under the Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification Act.
